Connected Lab is a digital product development firm. We plan, design, and build digital products for the worldâ€™s most ambitious brands. One of Canada's Top Small & Medium Employers.

Connected Lab is platform agnostic, exploring and applying new technologies like conversational interfaces and machine learning. To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether we are the right fit for you, read our Key Values profile at https://www.keyvalues.com/connected-lab
